mapper.select: SELECT FROM t_test WHERE id_first = #{idFirst,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND id_two = #{idTwo,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_test WHERE id_first = #{idFirst,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AND id_two = #{idTwo,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_test
id_first = #{idFirst,jdbcType=INTEGER},
id_two = #{idTwo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WHERE id_first = #{idFirst,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND id_two = #{idTwo,jdbcType=INTEGER}
